attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence in Boris Johnson's capability to be PM of UK
attributes.additional_details: Hold vote of No Confidence in Boris Johnson as Prime Minister of Great Britain, due to a clear lack of capability for his role.
attributes.background: Dec Boris Johnson stated that the new Tiers would be based on the R rates. At this point London was the highest Region with R 1.1 - 1.3  Yet, Boris Johnson approved London going into Tier 2. SAGE were aware of this faster spreading mutation of Covid in September 2020, according to W.H.O.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
